segments.text: Gosh ! The water faucet is dripping badly again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are going to have a huge bill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I ’ Ve got to get it fixed ASAP .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you wanna get it fixed now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish I could , but I ’ Ve got to go now . I have an appointment in 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if you need anything , just let me know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , by the way , could you give me a ride ? My car is still in the garage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You sure have bad luck these days .
segments.speaker: S2
